document_data.caption: Laeral's silver lance strikes true.
document_data.name: Laeral's Silver Lance
document_data.mainbody: '''''Laeral's silver lance''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[evocation]] [[spell]] that created a column of force resembling a silver [[lance]].
document_data.Effects: The caster pantomimed a throw and the lance streaked toward a single target, striking with a violent blast of force that often knocked the target off their feet in addition to causing physical harm. The range of the lance depended on the caster's skill, but could reach a minimum distance of {{SI|400|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required as a [[material component]] a miniature [[silver]] lance engraved with runes and worth at least 250 [[gp]] to cast. The silver lance was used as the [[spell focus]].
document_data.History: This spell was developed by [[Laeral Silverhand]] of [[Waterdeep]].
